ygData.subject: Re: pet spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No offense intended, but, well, get used to it.  You re going to spend a LOT, and I mean A LOT of money before you see ANY return of ANY kind. Check
ygData.messageBody:
Daniel Stock wrote:
> Has anyone Successfully made Enchanted Rings? I just got the spell,
> and i wasted 4 silver bars and 2 Carnelian.. yah.. talk about wanting
> to cry =(

No offense intended, but, well, get used to it. You're going to spend a
LOT, and I mean A LOT of money before you see ANY return of ANY kind.
Check http://home.fuse.net/cdwalker/jewel.htm for some tips on what you
can put together to get what things.

> Please help.. my money is dwindling =)

It's going to. Raise your skill up to 21 with practice points first,
then start practicing with Cat's Eye Agate and Silver.

-Bukaru, Teri'Dal Enchanter, Test Server
